entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOP @WhiteHouse Also Mark Meadows is a liar too! He said just like Trump “99% of COVID-19 cases is harmless” now doctors is finding out that even if you survive after having COVID-19, you may still have to deal with long lasting medical complications! Blood clots, shortness of breath and etc!
